subs.text: Today was the day I was dreaming of in the depth of winter.

I don't hate the Nets for any reason other than they are (I hope) the last instance of a superteam, a concept pioneered by LeBron James, whose career as a superteam founder is now over, btw, as of this week. Basketball is a sport. I know it's also a business, but I don't give my heart to businesses. Sorry.

I think I'm going to have to write a this.how piece about breaking users, and all the times people have learned the hard way that breaking users or developers is total misery for everyone, so don't do it. Examples: Python, Font-Awesome. Here's the thread.
In Treatment is like getting therapy yourself.
